name: Don't Merge ok?
description:
Don't merge ok ? is a game I created for the Score Space Jam. 

Controls- WASD movement, Click to Shoot

Backstory:- You play as Chad Earth fighting against the average haters and douchebags. These enemies have found a way to turn their average loser energy into attack strength. They can merge  and create powerful but stupid bosses, beware of these enemies.  Go ahead chief, finish 'em all! (And Enjoy!)

Warning-I added some music that I created. It's gonna loop so if it gets irritating just press the BUTTON

Hey you're still reading this? Anyway if you use the Godot game Engine and are looking to make a leaderboard or store player data, check out Silent Wolf, I couldn't use it in my project (Because I'm dumb and messed up) but it is an amazing service. Not Sponsored ok? I just feel that way :/
